title: PRAYER
description: Musician Tim Timmons has an interesting perspective on prayer. He says, "prayer doesn’t change anything, but Jesus changes everything."  On today’s Making Your Life Count Tim speaks from his own experience in his fight with cancer.

title: PROCESS
description: ​Looking back … do you remember the process God took you through on your journey to Him? Well, today on Making Your Life Count, Dan Keller gives us his own personal story.

title: CARE
description: You know, caring for people can sometimes speak louder than words. And Bernadette Todd says taking time to care for her neighbor ultimately made an eternal difference.

title: SHARING
description: Sharing your faith can be scary, but that doesn't stop Erica Stevens.  She has found that faith will actually replace fear in our lives. She explains on today's Making Your Life Count.

title: ENCOURAGEMENT
description: When Lauren Chandler’s husband, Matt, was diagnosed with a brain tumor, their lives and their faith were tested. Lauren says a passage in the Bible has been a great encouragement to her.
